name: Bridge
placementPrereq: All neighbouring Districts cannot be Bridge. This District must be built on a Stream or River.

name: Merchant's House
adjacencyBonus: +2 Dust for each adjacent Communal Habitations

name: Trading Post
info: Roads will be automatically created between Districts containing a Trading Post
adjacencyBonus: +4 Dust for each adjacent Resource Deposit

name: Laboratory
